definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
oil crop (rape, peanut, soy, sesame etc)/oil-bearing crop

sentences.english: The Grain Budding shows that crops that will ripen in summer start to show plump seeds.
sentences.chinese: 小满表示在夏季成熟的农作物籽粒开始饱满了。

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 红边位置常被用于监测作物叶片氮素营养状况。

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物复种方式不断优化，复种指数呈波动式增长。

sentences.english: Vaccines and even staple food crops have been modified to achieve these goals.
sentences.chinese: 疫苗及甚至主粮作物已被修改去实现这些目标。

sentences.english: There lies a vast extension of golden crops before us.
sentences.chinese: 一望无际的金灿灿的农作物展现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: During the growing season there is no time for socializing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 在作物生长季节，根本就没工夫参加社交活动。

sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 冰雹毁坏了农作物，甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.english: Cassava is a starch crop of which the product harvested is the root tubers.
sentences.chinese: 木薯是淀粉作物，收获的产品主要是块根。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output was supplied.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了农作物产量的预测预报方程。

sentences.english: Yes, only one herbicide is needed for all Roundup Ready crops.
sentences.chinese: 而且，所有的抗草甘磷作物只需要一种除草剂。

sentences.english: Farmers, encouraged by high prices, have been planting more grain.
sentences.chinese: 农民受高物价鼓励，已经种植了更多的作物。

sentences.english: The supply of non-GM crops is also dwindling, which is forcing prices higher.
sentences.chinese: 非转基因作物的供应也在减少，这促使价格升高。

sentences.english: A great variety of crops are likewise grown successfully on these plots.
sentences.chinese: 各种不同的作物也成功地在这些农区里生长。

sentences.english: Cattle can damage forage crops by eating down to the roots.
sentences.chinese: 牛会把草根吃掉，这样会损害饲料作物。

sentences.english: That is because honey bees pollinate food crops of all kinds.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们大部分的农作物都是靠它们来授粉的。
